entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning before morning. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
